qa_multi_document_information_integratio.question: According to the hospitalization records of Granville General Hospital and Victoria General Hospital, what are the ages of patients J. Rodriguez and O. Price?
qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization records of Granville General Hospital, patient J. Rodriguez is 7 years old; according to the hospitalization records of Victoria General Hospital, patient O. Price is 76 years old.
